casebody.data:
LeFloris LYON, petitioner,
v.
WISE CARTER CHILD AND CARAWAY, P.A., et al.; LeFloris Lyon, petitioner,
v.
Wise Carter Child and Caraway, P.A., et al.; and LeFloris Lyon, petitioner,
v.
Wise Carter Child and Caraway, P.A., et al. No. 14-9387. Supreme Court of the United States June 1, 2015.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
